```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(flexdashboard)
library(viridis)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.asp = .6,
  out.width = "90%"
)

theme_set(theme_bw() + theme(legend.position = "bottom"))
data("instacart")

organic_mozzarella_shreds = 
  select(instacart, order_number, product_name, department, aisle, order_dow) %>%
  mutate(week_day = recode(order_dow, 
       "0" = "Sunday",
       "1" = "Monday",
       "2" = "Tuesday",
       "3" = "Wednesday",
       "4" = "Thursday",
       "5" = "Friday",
       "6" = "Saturday")) %>%
  filter(str_detect(aisle, "cheese")) %>%
  filter(str_detect(product_name, "[S,s]hredded")) %>%
  filter(str_detect(product_name, "Mozzarella")) %>%
  group_by(week_day) %>%
  count(product_name)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A: Average Number of Shredded Mozzarella Orders Per Day of Week

```{r, echo = FALSE}
organic_mozzarella_shreds %>%
  mutate(text_label = str_c("Name: ", product_name, 
                            '\nWeek Day: ', week_day,
                            '\nNumber Ordered: ', n)) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~n, 
          y = ~week_day, 
          color = ~product_name, 
          colors = viridis_pal(option = "D")(3),
          type = "scatter",
          mode = "markers",
          text = ~text_label,
          alpha = 0.5) %>%
  layout(showlegend = FALSE)


```
